title: 02/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 02/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best Of edition of The Herd, Colin takes a look at the possible landing spots for J.J. Watt after his exit from the Texans and why there is one team that makes absolutely no sense. Colin also explains why there’s one head coach in the NFL getting a pass for his team underachieving with a great quarterback and he’s not sure why. Plus, Bucky Brooks joins the show to tell Colin if Clemson QB and projected #1 pick Trevor Lawrence will live up to all the hype. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In this Best Of edition of The Herd, Colin takes a look at the possible landing spots for J.J. Watt after his exit from the Texans and why there is one team that makes absolutely no sense. Colin also explains why there’s one head coach in the NFL getting a pass for his team underachieving with a great quarterback and he’s not sure why. Plus, Bucky Brooks joins the show to tell Colin if Clemson QB and projected #1 pick Trevor Lawrence will live up to all the hype.
